headline: 3DS app for installing DSiWare savedata exploits.
author: yellows8
description: This is a 3DS homebrew application for installing DSiWare savedata exploits, for DSiWare titles which you already have installed. This is intended as a .3dsx which requires access to svcBackdoor.

name: Cthulhu (CacheTool)
headline: 3DS Homebrew application for managing play time, steps and cached icon data.
author: Ryuzaki-MrL
description: The goal of this app is to provide an open-source alternative to some of the 3DS Development Unit Software, alongside with extra features.

name: Custom mmap XML Downloader
headline: 3DS Homebrew application for downloading *hax 2.7 custom memmap XML files.
author: Ryuzaki-MrL
description: This is a small homebrew application for downloading *hax 2.7 custom memmap XML files, needed for booting titles that are using seed encryption added in 9.6.0-24. Files are downloaded from https://github.com/ihaveamac/9.6-dbgen-xmls.

name: Gamecard Dumper
headline: Stand-alone version of Decrypt9's gamecard dumping functions.
author: TheGreek Boy

name: Craftus3DS
headline: A Minecraft clone for 3DS.
author: RSDuck
description: Craftus in a Minecraft clone for Nintendo 3DS (and not a continuation of 3DSCraft by smea).

name: NTR Launcher
headline: Bring back that classic DS boot screen for your DS games!
author: ApacheThunder
description: This is "NTR Launcher". A stripped down optimized version of NitroHax but without the cheat code system. This simply launches the game you have in SLOT-1.

name: Mini vMac 3DS
headline: WIP Port of the Macintosh emulator Mini vMac. Macintosh Plus 4MB Variant.
author: TaraHoleInIt
description: This version is the Macintosh Plus with 4MB variant, others may be supported later. Make sure you have a valid Macintosh Plus ROM image and place it in /3ds/vmac/ along with the files in the release archive. Note: Disk images must be auto loaded at runtime so make sure they're named diskX.dsk where X is 1 to how many images you want to load. Have your OS image already to go before copying your disks to your 3DS as you cannot swap disks to complete the install on the 3DS. There is no sound.

name: QuickiePong
headline: Pong port for the Nintendo 3DS.
author: Lectem

name: Headcannon Game Engine
headline: Multiplatform 2D Game Engine.
author: HCStealth
description: HCGE is a multiplatform game engine that can be used to create retro-style 2D games. Supported platforms include Windows, Linux, MacOSX, PSP (CFW), Wii (Homebrew Channel), GP2XWiz, GCWZero, and now, 3DS (Homebrew Launcher).

name: 3DS Piano
headline: Homebrew piano app.
author: Agent Moose
description: The homebrew piano app! Makes use of the 3DS's touch screen so you can play the piano!

name: LIEbel
headline: 3DS bluffing party game (Fibbage clone).
author: LeifEricson

name: CaptureAssistant
headline: A capture alignment tool for use with 3DS Capture Cards and NTRViewer.
author: Sasori

name: Yuki FM (LuaExplorer)
tags: utilities, files, multimedia, system, ARM11, userland, kernel, LUA
headline: File Explorer/Manager for the 3DS, written in LUA.
author: Hikiruka
description: This is yet another file manager being made with Lua Player Plus. As of this writing, it is currently suited for normal use. More features will be pushed to the repo. Heavily based on ORGANIZ3D.

name: Tic Tac Toe 3DS
headline: Port of the Android version of Tic Tac Toe.
author: Dan Donnan

name: Lie Detector
headline: Simple ASCII-based Lie Detector made for the Nintendo 3DS.
author: RosalinaFan573

name: ravimid
headline: A pyramidman's quest to save his father.
author: hoksy
description: Play as a local pyramidman as you crawl, fight, and ascend your way to save your father.

name: LiveScore 3DS
headline: Provides real-time football livescore and results service.
author: NichyXD

name: FlabbyBird3DS
headline: A Flappy Bird clone for the Nintendo 3DS.
author: reworks

name: EntroPipes
headline: Puzzle game where you have to turn the pipes until they are all connected.
author: son_link
description: EntroPipes is a puzzle type game where you have to turn the pipes until they are all connected. Simply press the pipe for rotate. Start button paused the game and X button is for back to the Homebrew Launcher. The game is also avaliable for Linux and Windows. The game is programed on Lua and the framework Löve (for PC) and LövePotion (Nintendo 3DS).

name: HexEditor
headline: Simple hexadecimal file editor.
author: Marshmallow

name: DSP Dump
headline: Dumps the DSP binary component, needed by many homebrew.
author: Cruel
description: This is a simple 3DS utility app to dump the DSP binary component needed for audio output in many 3DS homebrew applications. You need to merely open using the Homebrew Launcher, or any other method using *hax 2.0+. It will dump the needed file onto your SD card (/3ds/dspfirm.cdc), and you're ready. It only needs to be launched once.

name: LuCIAfer
headline: Download and install good CIAs right on your 3DS. Fork of CIAngel.
author: Aiscrim
description: Forked from CIAngel, this program is a simple approach to avoiding writing ids and keys when downloading games. It needs input.txt with a list of aliases associated with ids and encrypted keys.

name: Tetris Clone Made By a Bad Programmer
headline: Tetris clone.
author: Sleepy Flower Girl

name: Cubes
headline: Random white cubes in the top screen.
author: MagicInventor

name: FFEE
headline: Material editor for Final Fantasy Explorers.
author: Hayleia

name: A9LH SD Setup
headline: Prepares your SD card for Plailect's A9LH Guide.
author: Shubshub
description: Word of Warning: this Homebrew does not install arm9loaderhax, it merely copies all the files to the correct location.

name: Undertone
headline: Puzzle game with color shades.
author: Hayleia

name: Fruit'Y
headline: Fruit'Y port for 3DS
author: Retroguru
description: Fruit'Y - Playing with edibles is heavily inspired by the Kaiko classic Gem'X. The game consists of two boards of fruits. The left field belongs to Sheran who needs to reproduce the right field 1:1 being able to proceed to the next level. Sounds easy?! There is a total of five fruits. Once you control Sheran's prank and activate a field, the fruit inside the activated field morphs two steps, while the other fields located above, below, to the left and to the right, morph the fruit located inside only once.

name: Heretic3DS
headline: Port of Heretic for the Nintendo 3DS.
author: elhobbs

name: Gnop
headline: A pong game where you control the ball.
author: Jwiz33

name: 3DSLife
headline: A game of life!
author: Helreizerdev

name: 3DSSMS
headline: Sega Mega Drive emulator for 3DS. Port of smsplus.
author: cpasjuste

name: 3DSBFI
headline: A 3DS Brainf*ck Interpreter.
author: josamilu
description: 3DSBFI is a simple and minimalistic, WIP but mostly finished Brainf*ck Interpreter for 3DS. Not to be mixed up with FBI. It includes a special Brainf*ck editor, output and tutorial.

name: C_O_M_R_E_D
headline: Open source theme-able comic reader for the 3DS.
author: BEPISMAN2
description: In it's current state, this homebrew is unusable. The app crashes when exiting a comic and opening another comic. Only a theme named "test" is loaded from the SD Card (and it has totally unstylish design choices). The code's a complete and utter mess. Do NOT expect this to be a release of any sort. However, if you want to try it out anyways, you'll need to compile it. Be sure to put the /data/ folder at the root of your SD Card.

name: SmileBASIC File Manager
headline: Application designed to make transferring resources from a PC to SmileBASIC easier.
author: Trinitro21
description: SmileBASIC File Manager is an application designed to make transferring resources from a PC to SmileBASIC easier.

name: Corbenik CFW Updater: RE
tags: utilities, internet, maintenance, ARM11, userland, LUA
headline: Rewrite of the Corbenik/Skeith CFW Updater.
author: gnmmarechal
description: Now supports Skeith and Corbenik in a single app, without the issues the original updater had.

name: 3Dfrogr
headline: Frogger clone.
author: Tybus

name: Mazed
headline: Escape a maze one room at a time.
author: Machina
description: You begin in a room with one exit. From there you must go through other rooms to figure out which way leads to the end. Making a wrong turn will take you back to where you started, and once you decide to enter a room you cannot go back. Memory is the key to winning this game.

name: Cookie Clicker 3DS
headline: A perfect time waster based on Cookie Collector.
author: TheMachinumps

name: Super Block Attack
headline: Tetris clone for the Nintendo 3DS.
author: PMedia
description: This is a simple 3DS Homebrew Game. Don't expect any very funny gameplay, as this is just a test. There are also issues - better don't rotate pieces around the corner, as it may result in a game over screen.

name: 00Text
headline: Open Source text editor with an old mobile phone like keyboard.
author: K0ryan

name: BubblePop
headline: Touch bubbles before they disappear.
author: cynosura
description: Gameplay has never be so simple: A bubble spawn at a random position on the touch screen. Each frame, his radius is decremented. You need to touch it before it completely disappears of the screen! When you touch it, a new bubble spawn at a different position and with a different color.

name: Steelhax Installer
headline: Use this to install steelhax to your system.
author: VeRoXass
description: Use this to install steelhax to your system. Requires SteelDiver SubWars and an internet connection.

name: PHBankManager
tags: utilities, savefile, storage, ARM11, userland, pokemon
headline: Multi Bank Manager for PHBank.
author: zaksabeast
description: PHBankManager (not affiliated with PHBank and its creator) allows the user to have multiple bank files that are able to be renamed with a computer or 3ds homebrew, and used offline in both .3dsx and .cia format. PHBankManager currently supports up to 20 bank files (30 Pokemon in 100 boxes for 20 bank files = 60,000 total Pokemon slots.).

name: 3DSafe
headline: In-NAND PIN lock for 3DS.
author: mashers
description: 3DSafe is an arm9loaderhax payload which will lock your sysnand with a PIN. The PIN request is displayed as soon as the 3DS is powered on. Because the 3DSafe payload is the A9LH stage1/stage2 payload, it is stored in NAND itself, not on the SD card. After successfully entering the PIN, arm9loaderhax.bin is loaded from the SD card.

name: CHIP8-2DS
headline: Chip-8 emulator for 3DS.
author: nopy4869
description: The EXTRORDINARILY poorly named chip 8 emulator for 3DS. Controls are a little flakey, bound to various buttons, but can also be controlled by the touchscreen. This emulator supports 3D, savestates, screen scaling, etc.

name: Retrobattle
headline: Retrobattle port for the 3DS.
author: nop90
description: Retrobattle is made to look and feel like the classic arcade-style NES games, such as Ice Climber and Clu Clu Land. Not only are the sprites limited to three colors each, but the scoring, increasing difficulty, and setup of the game makes for a challenging arcade experience that mixes various oldschool concepts. This game was originally implemented in Game Maker by Daniel Remar. This is a port of C++/SDL implementation by Andreas Remar.

name: Twos! Woods
headline: 2048 mixed with Wario Woods for 3DS.
author: Haze3ds

name: OGG Vorbis Player
headline: Simple OGG music player.
author: machinamentum

name: Metroid II for 3DS (Tech Demo)
headline: Tech demo to show how a 3DS Metroid Game could look like.
author: jbr373

name: MCU Bricker
headline: Flashes the RGB LED in a semi-rainbow pattern.
author: MarcusD
description: Flashes the RGB LED in a semi-rainbow pattern. The application title is just a joke.

name: kSketch
headline: Etch A Sketch program for the 3DS.
author: thekman

name: Lemmings for 3DS
headline: Clone of the DOS videogame "Lemmings" for the 3DS.
author: Matthias
description: Clone of the DOS videogame "Lemmings" for the 3DS. Still in (very slow) development, so some features are missing.

name: Lima3DS
headline: A rxTools-like modern CFW.
author: Billy Acuña
description: Lima3DS is a fork of both Decrypt9 and Luma3DS which its only intention is to be a rxTools-like CFW+Toolkit in a nice-looking frontend.

name: CustomVersionSetter
headline: Custom Version Setter for Luma3DS.
author: BernardoGiordano
description: You can now edit your system version directly from the 3DS. You'll be returned immediately to the home menu, then just open system settings to see your changes. The application automatically adjusts the string if your version doesn't match 19 characters.

name: Pituka Classics: Rick Dangerous
headline: Virtual Console style CPC MonoGame Emulator. This release includes "Rick Dangerous".
author: D_Skywalk
description: Pituka/Wituka is an Amstrad CPC Computer Emulator very popular in Europe, mainly in the United Kingdom, France, Spain and Germany (where the CPC was sold under the Schneider brand).

name: BiPoLAR
headline: Bifunctional Power Light Administrator. Toggles the 3DS power LED on/off.
author: Spaqin
description: It's really simple, but still very useful for playing during the night. Power LED is reset on sleep and reboot (not soft reboot, like Smash does on o3DS).

name: Flite 3DS
headline: Flite-TTS (Text to Speech) for 3DS.
author: Cruel, Pirater12
description: This is a simple example of how to use the Flite voice synthesizing engine to speak text.

name: BootNTR Selector
headline: Select which NTR version to boot.
author: Nanquitas
description: A little mod of the BootNTR which will allows you to choose the version of NTR you want to load. You have the choice between the version 3.2, 3.3, 3.4.

name: 3DSSCalc
headline: A basic scientific calculator for 3DS.
author: RLilligant

name: Newquay
headline: Help install new additions to that titlekey site.
author: hippydave
description: Run Newquay and get it to download the decTitleKeys.bin, then reboot to Decrypt9 and encrypt it to encTitleKeys.bin.... reboot, run Newquay, choose a title and it will make you an input.txt. Open that with CIAngel and your chosen game will be installed.

name: Pocket-NLSE
headline: A portable save editor for Animal Crossing: New Leaf on the Nintendo 3DS.
author: dragos240

name: Sqrxz 4
headline: Port of Sqrxz 4 for the 3DS.
author: Retroguru
description: After Sqrxz saving Yve in “Sqrxz 3 – Adventure for Love” it was truly a happy moment. Being still heavily in love they decided that the time for a tiny wedding ceremony has come. Couple of months later both were sure that the time for an own small family has come. Although those are happy news Sqrxz is consequently short of money and a growing family requires a solid financial base. Picking up a newspaper and reading the job offers, a single add caught Sqrxz’s attention. An expedition in search of ice marbles needs a brave explorer. This sounds like a job for Sqrxz!

name: SpecializeMii
headline: Golden pants for everyone!
author: phijor
description: SpecializeMii is an application for the Nintendo 3DS that allows you to set the special-Status on abitrary Miis in your MiiMaker database. Normally reserved only for Miis distributed by Nintendo, a special Mii wears Golden Pants and triggers special events in certain applications.

name: Memory 3DS
headline: A 3DS memory game!
author: Omegadrien
description: A memory game for Nintendo 3DS. Have fun playing this game!

name: Sqrxz 2
headline: Port of Sqrxz 2 for the 3DS.
author: Retroguru
description: Another day another journey… As living on planet earth and its surrounding solar system seemed boring Sqrxz decided to check out another location in the universe. Just in case and to be extra careful he took a pocketful of emeralds with him to keep him in ready cash, but after starting his exciting journey he realised all his emeralds are suddenly missing! Retracing his steps Sqrxz notices mysterious creatures popping up all over the place to hinder him in his search… Oh what troublesome days… Help poor Sqrxz get back all his emeralds!

name: MegaZeux 3DS
headline: A port of MegaZeux to the 3DS.
author: asie
description: MegaZeux is a game creation system originally released in 1994 and still being developed.

name: Smash Amiibo Cheat Tool
headline: Hack your amiibos in a tap.
author: Ordim3n
description: Smash Amiibo Cheat Tool is a (N)3DS/2DS homebrew that have the ability to hack your smash amiibos. For the moment, it buffs all your amiibo's stats to 200.

name: BallEsca
headline: Control a ball in order to avoid "ennemies".
author: cynosura
description: In BallEsca, you control a ball on the touch screen, in order to avoid "ennemies" balls that randomly spawn and cross the screen. It is inspired by the NSMBDS "Danger Bob-omb, danger!" minigame.

name: TownManager
headline: Manage multiple AC:NL savefiles.
author: dragos240
description: TownManager allows you to easily manage multiple towns in AC:NL. It automatically backups your current save to a folder called "Main". From there you can select "New" which will delete your current savefile and create a new folder with the name that you entered in. After you do this, the game will launch automatically. Setup your new town and the next time you open TownManager, your latest saves will be backed up to the last folder you launched. Now you can select the folder you want and load & launch the town you have selected in one step. No more messing with a generic save manager and launching the game separately.

name: TWLoader
headline: CTR-mode .NDS ROM loader.
author: Robz8
description: TWLoader is a CTR-mode .NDS ROM loader that looks like the Nintendo DSi Menu.

name: luaIRC
headline: IRC Client for 3DS.
author: rinnegatamante
description: luaIrc is an IRC client for 3DS written with Lua Player Plus 3DS, allowing you to chat with your friends whenever you want.

name: Mk7se
headline: Mario Kart 7 save editor.
author: Pirater12
description: Edit your Mario Kart 7 savefile right from your 3ds!

name: Griffon Legend 3DS
headline: Port of a nice Action RPG in SNES style originally written by Syn9 in FreeBASIC.
author: nop90
description: The Griffon Legend is an action RPG with screen-to-screen map. It features original storyline and design made in 16-bit style RPG's of SNES/GENESIS era. During gameplay you can see up to 3 bars below your character. The top is health, the next is attack strength (let it charge to hit harder) and then spell strangth (same as attack). When you learn new spells you will see their icons in the bottom right corner with a meter below them to show them charging. When the meter turns orange they are ready for use.

name: Zelda Picross
headline: Port to 3DS of the Zelda style picross game by Vincent Joiullat.
author: nop90
description: Following a vow to the Triforce formulated by Ganon on a sad rainy day, the kingdom of Hyrule changed into Picross grids. Using his courage and pencil together, Link set off on this new challenge.

name: ctrmus
headline: Music player for the 3DS.
author: deltabeard
description: This is a music player for the 3DS. It plays PCM WAV, AIFF, FLAC and OPUS.

name: nimSM
headline: Uses PxiFS0 to manage the nim savegame.
author: Plailect
description: This is a nim save manager that uses PxiFS0 to backup, restore, or zero out the nim savegame. Requires arm11 kernel privileges, which it currently gets with svchax. Zeroing out or deleting the savegame will cause it to be recreated by nim. Doing this before a downgrade will fix the "soft brick" that occurs for some devices.

name: Xump
headline: "Xump - The Final Run" ported to the 3DS.
author: nop90
description: Xump - The Final Run is a simple multi-platform puzzler by Retroguru. Initially released by Psilocybin Development in 2005. Help Holger to clean up deserted space fields. As this is a very dangerous task for a human being a headbot named Xump will be the one who has to suffer. Your main task is to clean all dissolving tiles on several single-screen levels by simply stepping on them, one by one. Few fields are secured with mines and need a double tap. Mines can be blown up when passing by or disarmed by Xump when staying on this specific field for a short moment. Certainly the mission sounds easier than it will be.

name: POWDER 3DS
headline: Port to 3DS of the roguelike game POWDER.
author: nop90
description: POWDER is a roguelike originaly developed specifically for the Gameboy Advance. It is not a port of an existing roguelike as the controls of the GBA are very different from the traditional keyboard, and the screen imposes some additional limitations. The game goal is very simple, descend into the depths of the dungeon until you reach the foul daemon known as "He who the author cannot spell consistently", or, Baezl'bub. When you have slain Baezl'bub in heroic combat, or, if Baezl'bub dies in any way, retrieve his black heart and bring it to the surface world.

name: Snakes
headline: Snake game with local multiplayer.
author: Desynched

name: 3DeMore
headline: Reset 3DS demo use counter.
author: Kyraminol
description: Reset all demo use counters and exit in few seconds. Simple, minimal, functional.

name: Turtle Tale
author: TurtleP
description: Work in progress.

name: JETSKI 3DS
headline: You are a jetski legend that cruises the big blue jumping waves and ducking under bridges.
author: ElementalCode
description: JETSKI 3DS is an unofficial game for Nintendo 3DS made during GGJ 2017. It runs in the implementation of the LÖVE API for 3DS Homebrew, LovePotion.

name: amiibo Collection
headline: Homebrew for managing your amiibo collection.
author: Slimfr01
description: The goal of this future app is to provide an amiibo collector album for the Nintendo 3DS completed by scanning amiibo with the NFC Reader of the Old 3DS or built-in reader of the New 3DS.

name: 3ds1010
headline: Port of the 1010! mobile game to the 3DS.
author: LiquidFenrir
description: It's like Tetris but with infinite time, you lose when you can no longer place any of the pieces you have available.

name: Pong 3DS
headline: A 3D pong game for 3DS with software rendering.
author: AntonioND

name: InputRedirection
headline: Redirect 3DS input over wifi.
author: Stary2001

name: StarUpdater-UN
headline: Homebrew for updating your Luma3DS payload.
author: gnmmarechal, astronautlevel2
description: This is a simple updater for Luma3DS. It uses LPP-3DS in order to work, and it is available as both a 3DSX and a CIA. Up-to-date fork of StarUpdater

name: Evolution Sav3D Me
headline: A monkey who wants to survive!
author: Manurocker95
description: Evolution Saved Me ported to the 3DS. Get all the bananas that you can without touching the lasers. The fire are power ups that allows you to go through lasers when activated.

name: Hydra Castle Labyrinth
headline: Port of Hydra Castle Labyrinth to the 3DS.
author: E. Hashimoto
description: Port of Hydra Castle Labyrinth, a Japanese freeware PC indie game from the Metroidvania genre created by one E. Hashimoto also known as Buster.

name: Halo Revamped
headline: Port of Halo Revamped to the 3DS.
author: TCPixel
description: Halo Revamped is a Halo inspired mod for quake that was originally on the PSP. Halo Revamped in itself is a heavy mod of Halo Solitude that was made for PSP.

name: 3DS Cookie Clicker
headline: Port of the browser game called "Cookie Clicker" to the 3DS.
author: Creckeryop

name: 3DS Crypto Server
headline: ARM11 Userland homebrew for 3DS crypto over the network.
author: SciresM

name: SDLPAL
headline: SDL-based reimplementation of "Xian Jian Qi Xia Zhuan" (PAL) ported to the 3DS.
author: ZephRay
description: XianJian QiXia Zhuan 仙劍奇俠傳 (also known as The Legend of Sword and Fairy and "PAL") is an action RPG created by Taiwan's Softstar Entertainment Inc. The game is considered by many as simply one of the best Chinese RPG ever created. Since its first release in 1995 (DOS Version), many new versions and sequels (including a prequel) were created. However, none could replace the breath-taking and tragic tale it was born from. Here, we meet our protagonist Li Xiaoyao; an aspiring martial artist and the lovely Zhao Ling'er, a charismatic Nuwa descendant.​

name: Happy Land
headline: A game where you go on a quest to get back the potatoes that Big Foot stole from you.
author: MyLegGuy

name: imgurup 3DS
headline: Imgur upload client for 3DS.
author: Pirater12

name: Pixel-Painter
headline: Simple drawing homebrew.
author: 8BitWonder

name: Sleepmode Installer
headline: Download titles when in sleep mode.
author: Reisyukaku
description: This adds titles for sleep mode download with nim. Enter titleID and watch it download.

name: NP2 for 3DS
headline: Japanese NEC PC-9801 series computer emulator.
author: raima

name: Meritous
headline: Port of the game Meritous to the 3DS.
author: nop90
description: Meritous is a cross between a top-view dungeon crawler and a bullet-hell shoot-em-up. In it, you control main character Merit, who travels through an enormous 3000-room labyrinth, the Orcus Dome, in order to find three artifacts called the PSI Keys, and restore them to their proper locations.

name: OpenTyrian3DS
headline: Port of the DOS shoot-em-up Tyrian.
author: nop90
description: OpenTyrian is a port of the DOS shoot-em-up Tyrian, an arcade-style vertical scrolling shooter. The story is set in 20,031 where you play as Trent Hawkins, a skilled fighter-pilot employed to fight Microsol and save the galaxy.

name: Xrick
headline: Port to 3DS of the open source remake of Rick Dangerous.
author: nop90
description: Way before Lara Croft, back in the 1980's and early 1990's, Rick Dangerous was the Indiana Jones of computer games, running away from rolling rocks, avoiding traps, from South America to a futuristic missile base via Egypt and the Schwarzendumpf castle. Xrick is a clone of Rick Dangerous, known to run on Linux, Windows, BeOs, Amiga, QNX, all sorts of gaming consoles.

name: NTRDBI
headline: WIP NTRDB Downloader.
author: adrifcastr

name: VirtuaNES 3DS
headline: Port of VirtuaNES, a NES emulator.
author: bubble2k16
description: This is a port of VirtuaNES to 3DS as an alternative to existing NES emulators. It used to be considered one of the best emulators before FCE and Nestopia, and it runs quite fast for lower spec-ed computers (at the cost of some emulation accuracy). But because of that, the Old 3DS / 2DS is able to benefit from this fast running emulator core. This runs full speed on an old 3DS / 2DS with support for tonnes of mappers. Although it doesn't support every single mapper, the library of games that can run on this are probably fairly huge already.

name: Hex-a-Hop
headline: Port of Hex-a-Hop, hexagonal tile-based puzzle game.
author: nop90
description: Hex-a-Hop is a hexagonal tile-based puzzle game with one simple goal: destroy all green tiles! There are infinite undos and no time limits -- you just have to find a way to destroy all the green tiles and step on a safe tile at the end.

name: SuperTux Milestone 1
headline: Port to 3ds of Supertux v0.1.3 (Milestone 1).
author: nop90
description: SuperTux is a free classic 2D jump'n run sidescroller game in a style similar to the original Super Mario games.

name: Lua Red
headline: Lua scriptable Pokemon Red for N3DS.
author: cheesylard

name: Pixel Rush
headline: Homebrew game inspired by VoxelRush 3D.
author: Chopsuey
description: The game features two gamemodes, a super fast action gameplay, fancy colors, and you can actually save your highscore if you quit the game using the "Quit Game" button in the menu.

name: Hermes 3DS
headline: Port of Hermes to the 3DS.
author: Retroguru
description: Hermes is an extraordinary Jump'n Run game covering bad taste humour. If you feel offended by crude and dirty humour you may run away now. The game also features pixel violence and promotes the consumption of meat. If you are a hardcore vegetarian, you might very much dislike the game or just have a good laugh.

name: What's in the box?
headline: Tap the box to see what's inside.
author: Manurocker95
description: Just TAP on the bottom screen 'til the box opens. Each stage has a new color for the background.

name: Maze of Galious
headline: Port to 3DS of the remake of Maze of Galious.
author: nop90
description: MoG is a very addictive game where you have to kill thousands of enemies, collect items to obtain new powers and defeat some really great demons at the end of each level. In MoG you are free to go everywhere you want from the beginning of the game. The map is structured in a main map (called the castle) and 10 submaps (called the worlds). To complete the game you have to defeat the boss at the end of each world. To defeat all 10 demons you control two characters: Popolon and Aphrodite. Each one has special abilities, i.e. Popolon has a greater ability to jump and Aphrodite is able to dive.

name: Themely
headline: A beautiful theme manager for Nintendo 3DS.
author: ErmanSayin
description: Themely is a custom home menu manager for the Nintendo 3DS.

name: 3DShell
tags: utilities, multimedia, files, system, ARM11, userland
headline: Multi-purpose file manager GUI for the Nintendo 3DS.
author: joel16
description: 3DShell (pronounced 3D-Shell) - is a multi-purpose file manager GUI for the Nintendo 3DS. The program is currently in its early stages and lacks many features that are currently in development. More information will be given once the program matures.

name: SafeB9SInstaller
headline: Safe, simple, user-friendly installer for sighaxed FIRMs.
author: d0k3

name: TemperPCE for 3DS
headline: This time, it's a port of Exophase's Temper (TurboGrafx/PC-Engine) emulator.
author: bubble2k16
description: It's a port of Exophase's Temper (TurboGrafx/PC-Engine) emulator to the old 3DS and old 2DS. Despite all the optimisations Exophase did to run Temper on a portable device, the old 3DS is still too underpowered. So this port heavily relies on the 3DS's 3D GPU hardware to achieve 60 FPS (or close to 60 with frame skips). Since we are using the hardware, some games that utilise special palette effects may not work so well.

name: imgr3DS
headline: A basic (beta) Imgur client for the 3DS.
author: sereneblue
description: This client does not use OAuth so it is limited to browsing the hottest posts (frontpage).

name: Sqrxz 3
headline: Port of Sqrxz 3 for the 3DS.
author: Retroguru
description: Sqrxz and his girlfriend were on a romantic adventure journey in a jungle somewhere here on our planet. All of a sudden Yve gets kidnapped by an evil power and Sqrxz is forced to collect dozens of shiny little rings to free her. The old ruins he has to explore are anything else than safe. Traps are spread all over the place... and... Sqrxz is not alone!

name: DSP1
headline: DSP firmware dumper in CIA format.
author: zoogie
description: Like other homebrew apps before it, this just dumps the dspfirm.cdc needed for sound in cia homebrew.

name: 3DiScord
headline: A Discord client for the Nintendo 3DS
author: cheuble
description: 3DiScord is a heavily WIP Discord client for the 3DS based on VitaCord by devingDev / coderx3.
